Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Object
The GameLogic class manages the game mechanics of a Blackjack-like card game. It handles the deck, players (dealer, player1, bot1, bot2), game statistics, and game flow including player actions and determining the winner.

    • determineWinner

      public String determineWinner()
      Determines the winner of the game based on the current sums of all players and the dealer.
      Returns:
      The name of the winner ("Dealer", "Player", "Bot 1", or "Bot 2").
